text = 'QPVWQOVWQLVWQICVWQEV'

newtabl = {}
for key, character in enumerate(text):
	counter = 0
	for i in range(len(text)):
		if character == text[i]:
			counter += 1
	newtabl[character] = counter
	if counter == 252:

	if counter == 249:

#find the secret word
result = ''
for key, character in enumerate(text):
	if text[key - 1] == startletter and text[key + 1] == endletter:
		result += character

2) The starting letter appears in the text exactly 252 times.
3) The ending letter appears in the text exactly 249 times.
